word: H4726 - מָקֹור - mâqôwr - maw-kore' - Fountain - ஊற்று

sections.paragraph: Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H6979; properly something dug, that is, a (generally) source (of water, even when naturally flowing; also of tears, blood (by euphemism of the female pudenda); figuratively of happiness, wisdom, progeny): - fountain, issue, spring, well (-spring).
Cognate: H4726, H6979
